name: jsplumbtoolkit-demonstrations
description: A set of demonstrations for the Toolkit edition. Previously these were all in separate repositories in the jsplumb-toolkit-demonstrations organisation. These demonstrations require a 6.x version of the Toolkit.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:vanilla;npm run build:angular;npm run build:vue2;npm run build:vue3;npm run build:react;npm run build:svelte

author: jsPlumb <hello@jsplumbtoolkit.com> (https://jsplumbtoolkit.com/)
